Class Turtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Turtle

  • public class Turtle
extends java.lang.Object
    A turtle for a turtle graphics system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double heading 
      double xcord
      Instance variables
      double ycord 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Turtle()
      Creates a new Turtle with heading due north (0 degrees), and position at the origin (0,0)
      Turtle(double inith)
      Creates a new Turtle with specified heading and position at the origin (0,0)
      Turtle(double x, double y)
      Creates a new Turtle with heading due north (0 degrees) and specified position
      Turtle(double inith, double x, double y)
      Creates a new Turtle with specified heading and position

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bk(double dist)
      Move backward dist steps.
      void fd(double dist)
      Move forward dist steps.
      double heading()
      Current heading of this turtle in degrees, 0 to < 360, with 0 due north.
      void lt(double offset)
      Turns left offset degrees.
      void rt(double offset)
      Turns right offset degrees.
      void setHeading(double tHeading)
      Resets the turtle to tHeading.
      void setx(double x)
      Resets the turtle to x position.
      void sety(double y)
      Resets the turtle to y position.
      double xcor()
      Current x position of the turtle.
      double ycor()
      Current y position of the turtle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Turtle

        public Turtle()
        Creates a new Turtle with heading due north (0 degrees), and position at the origin (0,0)

      • Turtle

        public Turtle(double inith,
      double x,
      double y)
        Creates a new Turtle with specified heading and position

      • Turtle

        public Turtle(double inith)
        Creates a new Turtle with specified heading and position at the origin (0,0)

      • Turtle

        public Turtle(double x,
      double y)
        Creates a new Turtle with heading due north (0 degrees) and specified position

    • Method Detail

      • setx

        public void setx(double x)
        Resets the turtle to x position.

      • sety

        public void sety(double y)
        Resets the turtle to y position.

      • setHeading

        public void setHeading(double tHeading)
        Resets the turtle to tHeading.

      • rt

        public void rt(double offset)
        Turns right offset degrees. The turtles heading is changed but the turtle position stays the same.

      • lt

        public void lt(double offset)
        Turns left offset degrees. The turtles heading is changed but the turtle position stays the same.

      • fd

        public void fd(double dist)
        Move forward dist steps. fd is exactly the opposite of bk. The turtle position is changed but the turtle heading stays the same.

      • bk

        public void bk(double dist)
        Move backward dist steps. bk is exactly the opposite of fd. The turtle position is changed but the turtle heading stays the same.

      • heading

        public double heading()
        Current heading of this turtle in degrees, 0 to < 360, with 0 due north.

      • xcor

        public double xcor()
        Current x position of the turtle.

      • ycor

        public double ycor()
        Current y position of the turtle.
